set(target mda-vst3)
smtg_add_vst3plugin(${target} ${mda-vst3_sources})
set_target_properties(${target}
    PROPERTIES
        ${SDK_IDE_PLUGIN_EXAMPLES_FOLDER}
)
target_link_libraries(${target}
    PRIVATE
        sdk
)
target_compile_features(${target}
    PUBLIC
        cxx_std_17
)
if(SMTG_MAC)
    smtg_target_set_bundle(${target}
    	BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "mda.plugins.vst3"
    	INFOPLIST "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/resource/mda-vst3-Info.plist" PREPROCESS
    )
elseif(SMTG_WIN)
    target_sources(${target}
        PRIVATE
            resource/mda-vst3.rc
    )
endif(SMTG_MAC)

if(SMTG_MDA_VST3_VST2_COMPATIBLE)
    target_compile_definitions(${target}
        PUBLIC
            SMTG_MDA_VST2_COMPATIBILITY
    )
endif(SMTG_MDA_VST3_VST2_COMPATIBLE)
